title: kandan kazalaDiyE
sahitya:
kandan kazhalaDiyE gati ena tudi manamE nI


anupallavi

  cendUr senravan cintai kaniyap-paNindAl bandha vinai vandunnai nonduyara sheyyAdu


caraNam    tirut-tamizhaghattai sirappura sheidavan viruppuDan kunrinai iruppiDam koNDavan
tiruppankurattil dEvAnaiyai maNandavan tiruttaNi tannil kura mAdai aNaindavan
